AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru culture snowleopard
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: The first memory of [Pawn_nameDef] is inside the dark incubator. [PAWN_pronoun], thrown into the frozen motherhood without knowing anything, somehow managed to find a way to survive on its own.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru homeworld wanderer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has awakened amongst the blackened sotdae, the frozen planet of origin. Although he could not recall anything that had happened before, he knew only one thing: how to live optimistically in a desperate situation.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru bookworm
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Ever since she was weaned, [PAWN_nameDef] has been buried in a pile of paper. He's one of the few Maru on that barren planet from which he's accustomed to the smell of paper rather than blood.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru Mountain ranger's child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} was raised by a mountain ranger. Although he was closer to a good teacher than a good parent, {PAWN_pronoun} truly loved and respected {PAWN_pronoun}.\nEven after his heart grew up in a twisted way, forever and ever.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru engineering student
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has been particularly interested in machines since childhood. The sense of accomplishment when I nailed broken pipes and tied them around to make something that worked for the first time had a huge impact on every choice [PAWN_pronoun] made after that.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru farmer's child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: There are three main things you need to do to farm on the planet where the Maru came from. The first is a transparent greenhouse where the temperature is maintained, the second is basic knowledge about farming, and the third is the power to find a warm place and stop the beasts that attack. Coincidentally, [PAWN_nameDef]'s parents had it all, and [PAWN_pronoun] wanted her to be a scumbag as well.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru little chef
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: In Maru society, cooking involves hunting. And the chef, who has the power to share food in the polar lands, symbolizes influence, or power, within the herd. Just as a human child imagined becoming president as a child, this young Maru dreamed of becoming a chef, wearing a paper apron and wielding a butcher's knife.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru sick child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: On the barren Maru's native planet, sickly born children are abandoned. [PAWN_nameDef]'s parents also made choices no different than the rest of the Maru, and [PAWN_pronoun] was weak and had to become more ingenious to survive on the frozen planet.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru little hunter
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Occasionally, young Maru start hunting in earnest from an early age for their own survival. Of course, most of those Maru are orphans who have just woken up in an artificial incubator, but the case of [PAWN_nameDef] was a little different in that they were orphaned after losing their parents to a game.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru different kind
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: On the planet of origin of the Maru, who are desperate to live day by day, art is an act that is generally not understood, throwing away food for tomorrow for the sake of invisible happiness. However, this Maru has always been passionate about making things with her thick fingertips, and the finesse of her hands has resulted in many other things.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru Caravan Deputy Commander
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was the deputy commander of a four-person caravan. When the white bear, the leader, carried the pack, and the other two white foxes, the other subordinates, scouted the area, [PAWN_pronoun] rode on the bear's back and negotiated.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru store owner
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: As he was about to run out of food while searching for his non-returning parents, [PAWN_nameDef] luckily found a building that was virtually intact inside. There were tons of preserved food in it, and it seemed that even [PAWN_pronoun]'s parents wouldn't have to go on a dangerous hunt. Although [PAWN_pronoun]'s parents still haven't returned, [PAWN_pronoun] laid out all sorts of junk he had picked up while walking around, waiting for the guests so that he could visit this place someday on the way.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru prototype
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is Maru crawling out of the crumbling clean room. Although his physical abilities are superior to other Maru's, [PAWN_pronoun]'s immunity is only half that of a normal person.\n[PAWN_pronoun]'s [PAWN_possessive] body is fighting for survival every day.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru student at the sari storage room
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] spent most of her childhood taking succession lessons from her predecessor librarians. Learning how to sort books, put bookshelves in, and how to store saris, [PAWN_pronoun] feels boring, I felt the buds of subjectivity, which had never been seen before, clearly bloom in my heart.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru Apprenticeship Decipher
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is an Apprentice Decipher. In fact, I feel annoyed because there are more things to be hugged one after the other by being brought in for no reason or moving from one place to another rather than learning how to interpret it directly. But in the end, it doesn't change that you have to learn interpretation from them, so [PAWN_pronoun] is trying to bring it up as much as possible.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru trap hunter
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a trapper. It is recommended by other hunters because he is still young enough to hunt properly, but it is rare that he does as well as [PAWN_pronoun] and is recognized as a single hunter earlier.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru child who smells like paper
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was somehow caught among archival analysts. Just like when infiltrating a group of wild animals, they bury their excrement to remove their vigilance. [PAWN_pronoun] also rubbed his body against old papers to hide in the gap and got caught. [PAWN_pronoun] and the group of analysts first met. I don't know what happened after that, but now [PAWN_pronoun] is really a part of them.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru lab janitor
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a janitor who takes care of all kinds of miscellaneous tasks in the lab. It's not very complicated, but [PAWN_pronoun], which Maru prefers to do less chores, works day by day with only admiration for the Mountain ranger and Decipher. .

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru ruin dweller
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] spent her childhood in deserted ruins. I don't remember why I was here or what kept me from going out, but at least the fact is that the ruins were kept until [PAWN_pronoun] decided to leave.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru normal culture
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up being infused with knowledge in a dark incubator. I didn't know much about the outside world, but maybe this one was better than freezing outside, starving, or being hunted to death.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru predictor
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] awakened on a remote planet and blended into their society as a member of a tribe there, precisely as the object of their worship. Maru's distinctive appearance gave [PAWN_pronoun] religious persuasive power, and [PAWN_pronoun] herself crafted the most persuasive prophecies by adding observations to observations to satisfy them. And it was not until later that I learned that the prophets of this planet were abandoned when they reached adulthood.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru runaway tribesman
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: The tribe that existed on the planet [PAWN_nameDef] belonged to was very open, even considering that there were many humans from other planets who had undergone genetic modification. No, to be precise, they were more of an extreme environmentalist than a tribe. [PAWN_pronoun], which was discovered by a group of them when they were young and grew up eating all kinds of weeds, eventually ran away from home, but thanks to this, his knowledge of crops was almost expert level.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru smart kid
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in a small tribe of Maru. [PAWN_pronoun], who lived with the tag of a genius since childhood, eventually lost interest in everything.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru little yeti
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in a small tribe of Maru. He was curious from a young age, so he ran through the snow and climbed up and down the mountain outside his residence, which sometimes caught the eyes of people at the bottom of the mountain and created a lot of rumors.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru heir
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in a small tribe of Maru. [PAWN_pronoun], who excelled in classifying and gathering medicinal herbs, was soon the priest's successor and was able to put together various ritual knowledge.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru apprentice hunter
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in a small tribe of Maru. [PAWN_pronoun], who persistently pursued adults who went hunting with a pile of javelins, was recognized as an apprentice hunter by the adults who could not overcome his stubbornness and learned various skills.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru revenger
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in a small tribe of Maru. However, one day, while [PAWN_pronoun] was out of town for a while, a lot of humans rushed to the village of Maru, and [PAWN_pronoun] managed to save his life, but there was no trace of anyone living there. This young Maru vowed vengeance on the humans under the mountain, and nothing else caught his eye.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru child under the mountain
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: This Maru was raised by human hands. Maru's beastlike appearance was considered an advantage by Maru's adoptive parents, and their love and care allowed [PAWN_pronoun] to kill Maru's nature and live alongside other humans.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru artisan's disciple
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was adopted by a famous artisan on a bustling planet. Although it was difficult for me to do detailed work like a human due to my natural limitations, that is why I was raised with more education to promote as a craftsman.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru vagabond
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] woke up from the wreckage of an abandoned spaceship and wandered around the planet. If there's one thing I've learned at the end of a long wandering life, it's that raising your eyes and wagging your tail at someone who looks wealthy can keep you from starving yourself for the day's meals.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru Hunter
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: This Maru is a professional hunter whose job is to receive food from other Maru on a regular basis and to deal with threatening prey in the vicinity.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru Hunter
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Some Maru develop a deep craving for hunting as they grow up.\nThis Maru has a particularly strong tendency, leaving herds and wandering around the planet in search of more satisfying prey.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru Hunter
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription:
{PAWN_nameDef} is obsessed with hunting pleasure.
Setting traps, munching on jerky, and staying overnight in one place, chasing bloodstains to track their prey, and catching the breath of their exhausted prey, {PAWN_nameDef} The whole process is a pleasure for {PAWN_pronoun}.

Is there any other Maru who raises the word vocation like this?

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru Hunter
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: This Maru is a professional hunter whose job is to receive food from other Maru on a regular basis and to deal with threatening prey in the vicinity.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru Hunter
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Some Maru develop a deep craving for hunting as they grow up.\nThis Maru has a particularly strong tendency, leaving herds and wandering around the planet in search of more satisfying prey.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru Hunter
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription:
{PAWN_nameDef} is obsessed with hunting pleasure.
Setting traps, munching on jerky, and staying overnight in one place, chasing bloodstains to track their prey, and catching the breath of their exhausted prey, {PAWN_nameDef} The whole process is a pleasure for {PAWN_pronoun}.

Is there any other Maru who raises the word vocation like this?

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru Disciple of the Mountain ranger
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} is a disciple of the Mountain Ranger.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru Mountain ranger
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription:
{PAWN_nameDef} is a hermit in the Deep Mountains, Twisted Valley, also known as the End of the Earth. 
I came to this valley with a small number of volunteers to study various devices that succeeded in reproducing through the technology of their ancestors, but the principle of operation is still unknown. 

{PAWN_pronoun}'s childlike, innocent, and at the same time obsessive quest for exploration has always been the light that sheds light on the other Maru's, and the path that guides them. 
No one knows if the future they will face is right. However, the fact that they, like bicycles, will only shake if they do not move forward is a fact shared by everyone here.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru Mountain ranger
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription:
{PAWN_nameDef} is a hermit in the deep mountains, where the soil is weathered by a mixture of creatures and machines. 
It's rather dangerous to move around in a group, so I'd carefully examine the ruins alone, like a blind man navigating the road. 

The longer I spend alone, the more my emotions become dull, but watching the light coming through the cracks of the ruins split and color the affected areas of the ruins, along with fear, an unknown sense of exaltation and mission comes to mind.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru Mountain ranger
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} is a hermit in the deep mountains, where light and lenses confuse each other to form a mirage.\nAs he investigates and records the ruins with his followers, he has no clue as to when this investigation will end and meaningful results. I don't know if it will come out. However, the {PAWN_pronoun} thoughts, wills, and beliefs that made them come here, made disciples, and passed on through them over and over again, will create another great relic in this place.\n{PAWN_possessive} As a task for disciples to explore and overcome.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru Mountain ranger
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} is a hermit in the deep mountains, where all organic matter flows and squirms. \nIn a place where every stench, noise, and sinister form imaginable is infested, {PAWN_pronoun} wears itself out to pursue only the truth. \n{PAWN_possessive} An attachment to the faith may destroy itself, but it will never defeat {PAWN_objective}.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru whaler
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: The flying whale, called the three-eyed whale, was awe-inspiring to the Maru, like earthquakes and tsunamis.\nWhen she was a child, [PAWN_nameDef], who saw whales soar in the sky with blue etheric waves, was one day He wanted to drop the whale into his own hands, and he is now a professional whale hunter.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru chef
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a chef in formal attire who prepares prey.\nCooking has always been reserved for the most influential Maru in the herd, and this Maru has proven himself through repeated hunting and has earned the title of Chef. has been

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru caravan leader
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: This eccentric and prideful Maru left the group and decided to build her own caravan.\nAlthough I have to admit that there are more items for sale than items for sale due to the small population of the planet from which she came from, at least eat the leftover pieces of meat. It was more free than the days of arguing with other Maru over it.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru artist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is an artist.\nAlways sharing little by little with other Maru's food, [PAWN_pronoun], who makes art with all kinds of objects, is full of artistic talent, but has forgotten all about hunting.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru mechanic
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] mainly researches and creates hunting tools that combine the characteristics of Maru and sari.\nHe made a great contribution to dropping flying whales from the object of worship to the position of their prey, and to this day, [PAWN_pronoun] The harpoons he made are favored by many Maru.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru Sarira Decipher
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] interprets saris using numerous tools, and uses the techniques extracted from them to create numerous tools to interpret saris.\nThe discovery of technology through the interpretation of saris is that the Maru will one day be in the same position as their ancestors in the world. [PAWN_nameDef] firmly believes that

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru biotechnologist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a technician who organizes, applies, and improves all bio-related technologies found in saris.\nHe has cultivated numerous pet snow leopards, and has consistently suggested their genetic improvement plans, and most have been adopted and are today's aegyo. A snow leopard that calls out was born.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru sarira engineer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: The sarira engineers are Maru who invent several new technologies, paying attention to the characteristics of sarira itself.\n[PAWN_nameDef] has always been at odds with the sarira Deciphers, adopting orphaned Maru children to get more sarira, or , and also bought Maru, who were captured and enslaved by humans.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru mother planet farmer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: If we were to rank the most important things for farmers on the mother planet, the military ranks first, the second place, and the third in farming knowledge.\nOf course, he has more knowledge about farming than other Maru, but farmers from other planets It's not very rich in comparison.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru archaeologist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]'s job is to dig through the rubble of buildings with strong claws and excavate relics of the past.\nActually, no one has recognized it as a job, but at least [PAWN_pronoun] thinks so.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru pontiff
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] oversees all the ceremonies of the tribe.\nThe funeral and ancestral rites of numerous Maru, and even village festivals are all included in the role of [PAWN_possessive].\nIt is difficult to resist the urge to go hunting on your own. , [PAWN_pronoun] is working with its own sense of mission.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru Hunter
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is an excellent Hunter.\nProficient in sneakily and swiftly approaching their prey, and definitively suffocating her with a single blow, [PAWN_pronoun] never misses her prey.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru tracker
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a tracer of the tribe.\nMainly, it is responsible for chasing down Maru who have sinned and fleeing or intermittent human raiders and eliminating them without anyone knowing. In normal times, it is also responsible for finding and protecting young Maru who have lost their way. there is.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru cause
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: No one knows the identity of [PAWN_nameDef].\nThere are rumors that he is Maru of nmother planet, there are rumors that he was raised by beasts, and there are even rumors that he is Maru who escaped from a human village under the mountain after sinning.\nAnd the most What's strange is that they don't seem to care too much about these rumors.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru vagabond
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is wandering aimlessly around the planet.\n[PAWN_pronoun] himself doesn't know what values ​​he pursues to keep his feet moving, but one thing is certain: beyond that horizon, something new is always waiting for [PAWN_nameDef]. that there is.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru breaker
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Any vicious animal becomes like a kitten when it goes through the hands of [PAWN_nameDef].\n[PAWN_pronoun], who has managed to form a bond while maintaining the wildness of the animals, probably takes more effort than a professional Hunter to find food. may have built

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru tribal
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is an ordinary tribal.\nKnowing some hunting skills, he can make daily meds, sew broken clothes, and do countless other things that don't even have to be expressed in words.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru farmer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] are one of the few farmers in the tribe.\nOriginally, they are Maru who prefer hunting rather than farming, but unlike the mother planet, when winter comes, all living things stop working, so they often borrow the hands of farmers.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru blacksmith
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] heats iron and smelts life.\nTo make it durable and long-lasting, not to be damaged in critical situations, and to be light enough to carry around everyday.\nFor these three purposes, the hammering continued day and night , has been the basis for numerous Maru hero stories.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru Cleaner
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a scavenger in the dark district.\nOnce a goal is set, he never misses it, and he was notorious for pursuing his prey as relentlessly as if he were hunting.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru manager
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: After a lot of work, [PAWN_nameDef] has finally got her own restaurant.\nFor the dignity of being a manager, you may need to tie up its waving tail for a while, but now [PAWN_pronoun] is entangled in anything other than its own string. It will not be.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru first-class chef
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a first-class chef.\n[PAWN_pronoun], who knows how to fully use Maru's sensitive senses in cooking, elevates the taste of food to the extreme, impressing many gourmets and inspiring artists.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru Office worker
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is an ordinary salesperson.\n[PAWN_pronoun], who can hypnotize and cook others to their liking, is clearly not an ordinary office worker, but I think so anyway.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru sniper
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription:
[PAWN_nameDef] is a veteran sniper with superhuman eyesight.
He has made a name for himself as a sniper across numerous battlefields, and has earned dozens of nicknames with blue and grim reaper.
Some places call him a soldier converted for war. There are horses, and in some places they say they are not human at all.
Actually, although they are not really human.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru zookeeper
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is an excellent keeper.\nAlthough it may be a disadvantage that it builds more bonds than necessary with the animals in charge, it becomes an irreplaceable manpower for some animals.\nSometimes outside the cage I've been told that the one inside is better than the one inside, but [PAWN_nameDef] still finds it rewarding to work as a zookeeper.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru sarira slave
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has never seen sunlight since becoming an adult.\nTied to a huge machine that looked like a mold, she was forcibly provided with food, clothing and shelter, and sarira was exploited in return.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru worker
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef], who always leaves the construction site early in the morning, is an exceptionally energetic Maru.\nIt may be because he does the same amount of work as an ordinary human with four times the strength of an ordinary human, but anyway, [PAWN_nameDef] is a very energetic person. Every day is fun.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru planet relay
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a planetary relay in charge of communication between planets and satellites.\nIn a workplace where only voices and voices come and go, [PAWN_nameDef] feels genuinely comfortable, free from species differences.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru mother planet investigator
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has been studying Maru's mother planet for quite some time.\nThe sudden disappearance of ancestors, the rapidly changing climate, and the Maru that appeared there could not be clearly explained, but in order to find even the smallest clue, the mother planet I got on a transport ship headed for planet.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru fashion model
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a famous fashion model.\nSuperior proportions and a distinctive face are the basics, and the pure white hair, eyes that glow in the dark, and freely movable ears and tail are [PAWN_possessive], which further strengthens the expressive power of the model. It gave him personality.\n[PAWN_pronoun], which can freely handle impressions such as static elegance and beauty, and dynamic cuteness and fear, is often used in the social realm as well.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru scientist's assistant
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is an eccentric human scientist's assistant.\nActually, rather than an assistant, he's a lab mascot, and he doesn't really do anything except pouring coffee or organizing documents nicely.\nI'm bored with nothing to do In [PAWN_pronoun], which I did, I tried things like adding various spices or seasonings, organizing documents, and reviewing them once in a while to realize the ultimate in coffee drinking.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru prostitute
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a prostitute who works in the red light district.\nProstitution that has been along with the history of mankind has given jobs to non-human races, even decades after the prophet's death.\nMaru's distinctive appearance makes some enthusiasts It worked well for [PAWN_pronoun] and brought [PAWN_pronoun] moderate wealth, but the more money he had in his wallet, the more [PAWN_possessive] feelings slowly died. I collected the money and boarded a spaceship heading to a distant outlying planet.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru master
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] creates new value from a variety of objects.\nThe magic that Maru uses with his thick fingertips cannot be imitated by anyone who dares to imitate him, and his ability was recognized and loved by everyone... is written in the notebook.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru liberation unit
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a member of the Maru Liberation Corps that liberates the Maru captured and enslaved by pirates.\nAlthough there are no outstanding achievements yet, their pride and enthusiasm never fall behind other members.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru mascot
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is the mascot of the caravan.\nBromide products and websites with pictures of [PAWN_possessive] in well-dressed are all over the internet, and [PAWN_pronoun] is satisfied with his job.\nBut, he is not well dressed. It's just a little stressful for her to have some bad pictures.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru Captain
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is the captain of the pirates.\nThis Maru, notorious for his tenacity, has become even more vicious in line with the ever-changing ecology of the universe.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru gang member
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a member of a criminal gang.\nAccording to the order of the organization, he handled a lot of things, and overcame numerous crises to have a personal business place, but I couldn't get used to the smell of human blood. Every time I smell it, bad memories flash before my eyes.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maru technical advisor
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has been immersed in research for a long time and has accomplished remarkable achievements, and is currently serving as a technical advisor to the Maru.
